title: Progreso’s Prolonged Pier
description: The pier that extends from Progreso into the Gulf of Mexico is among the longest such structures in the world. Located in a port city in Mexico in the state of Yucatán, the pier was built for docking large cargo and passenger ships.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
